charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant Plead Guilty to Count 1 on 03/29/2010 of The Indictment. Imprisonment: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term of 30 Months on Count 1, to Run Consecutively to Any Sentence Imposed in Jackson, Co, Case #1016-Cr00971. The Defendant is Remanded to The Custody of The United States Marshal. Supervised Release: Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of 3 Years Count 1. $100 Msa. no Fine or Restitution.
